attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For all those people around the world who feel the same strong hatred for the food of the devil that is MARMITE. I myself would rather eat a dead cows arsehole than a pot of Marmite! They brought back Cadbury's Wispa thru popular demand so lets BANNISH Marmite FOREVER

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
